name: Vitale #25
description: Your 1.03 carat Fancy Greyish Pinkish Purple diamond is rare, with a captivating and distinctive combination of hues. Your diamond was exposed to 900Â° Celsius and manages to withstand an immense pressure underground, experiencing a unique change in its atomic alignment. The green light waves are now completely absorbed when light passes through your diamond, resulting in its beautiful pinkish and purple colour. Like a mystical moonbeam, the unique combination of grey, pink, and purple hues in your diamond may symbolise a delicate balance of elegance, romance, and mystery.
